app.title: MyFuture AI
app.subtitle: Wò nunya dzi kplɔla na susufe ɖeka tiatia
app.description: Tso BEPC va se ɖe Gɔmeɖeɖe Kpekpe dzi, míekplɔ wò le wò mɔfia me
auth.description: Log in be nàdze mɔfia wɔwɔ gɔme.
auth.signup.verifyNote: You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
auth.passwordRules.title: Password rules
auth.passwordRules.maxBytes: Max 72 bytes (avoid emojis / very long characters)
auth.passwordRules.maxBytesError: Your password is too long for this system (bcrypt limit: 72 bytes). Please use a shorter password or remove emojis/unusual characters.
auth.google.todo: Google login is not wired yet.
auth.google.notice: If you use Google sign-in, please sign in with Google.
auth.google.error.title: Google sign-in
auth.google.error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth.google.error.unavailable: Google sign-in is unavailable right now.
auth.google.error.backendRejected: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
auth.google.error.missingToken: Login succeeded but no token was returned.
auth.forgot.title: Reset your password
auth.forgot.description: Enter your email address. We will send a secure reset link if an account exists.
auth.forgot.neutral: If an account exists, a reset link has been sent.
auth.forgot.error: We couldn't process your request. Please try again.
auth.reset.title: Choose a new password
auth.reset.description: Create a new password to access your account.
auth.reset.success: Password updated. You can now sign in.
auth.reset.error: Unable to reset password. Your link may be invalid or expired.
auth.verify.title: Verify your email
auth.verify.description: We are verifying your email address.
auth.verify.success: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in.
auth.verify.error: We couldn't verify your email right now. Please try again.
auth.verify.noteInvalidOrExpired: The server may not be able to distinguish an invalid link from an expired one.
auth.error.title: Authentication failed
auth.error.signin: Check your email/password and try again.
main.question: Nu ka nèdi be yeawɔ?
orientation.title: Mɔfia na susufe ɖeka tiatia
orientation.description: Ke ɖe susufe siwo sɔ kple wò sukudeɖeɖe ƒe nɔnɔme ŋu
advice.title: Aɖaŋuɖoɖowo kple ɖeɖefia
advice.description: Tsa le susufewo me, ke ɖe etsɔme ƒe dɔwɔnawo ŋu eye nàxɔ aɖaŋuɖoɖo gbɔmewo
advice.cards.choose_field.title: Aleke nàtia mɔƒe dzesi nyuie?
advice.cards.choose_field.content: Tɔ wò dzi ge ɖe dzesiwo ŋu, bu mɔ̃ le dukɔdidi me, eye nàkpɔ wò ɖoɖo siwo le agbe me.
advice.cards.future_jobs.title: Dukɔwo me ɖe emeɖe
advice.cards.future_jobs.content: Artifisial Intelijensi, Ɖoɖoɖo ƒe Nunana, Sɛbɛrisikuriti kple digitalen blema.
advice.cards.testimonials.title: Sukuvi ƒe ɖaseɖiɖiwo
advice.cards.testimonials.content: Ke ɖe sukuviwo ƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔwo ŋu le kɔleɖo vovovowo me.
advice.fields.science_tech.title: Nunya kple Tekinoloji
advice.fields.health.title: Blema kple Dɔkita
advice.fields.business.title: Aɖeɖudɔ kple Gaxɔnu
advice.fields.education.title: Sukuga
advice.fields.environment.title: Anyigba kple Ɖoɖoɖo ƒe Nunana
advice.fields.environment.description: Ekoloji, Elekiti ŋuɖoɖo si ƒe tso kple ƒuƒoƒo
advice.fields.communication.title: Kpeɖeŋu kple Midia
advice.fields.law.title: Aɖawɔƒe kple Politiki Nunya
advice.fields.arts.title: Abɔdɔ kple Design
advice.fields.arts.description: Grafik Design, Akitɛktɔ, Abɔdɔ si wo kplɔ dzesi
footer.title: Nu ka ta nàtia MyFuture AI?
footer.description: Míaƒe nunya wɔwɔ ƒe susu dzro wò sukudeɖeɖe ƒe nɔnɔme kple wò dzimedidiwo be wòaɖo susufe siwo sɔ wu na wò etsɔme ƒe dzidzedze.
orientation.step.level.title: Tia wò sukuƒe ƒe dzidze
orientation.step.level.description: Tiatia sia ana adzɔɖoɖoa nasɔ kple wò dzidze ƒe nufiafiawo
orientation.step.input.title: Aleke nèdi be yeade wò nukpɔkpɔwo?
inputMethod.title: Tia wò dede mɔ
inputMethod.manual.title: Asidede
inputMethod.manual.description: De wò nukpɔkpɔwo tẽe le adzɔɖoɖoa me
inputMethod.upload.title: Ɖo nukpɔkpɔgbalẽ
orientation.grades.title: De wò nukpɔkpɔwo
orientation.grades.description: Tia wò nukpɔkpɔ ƒe dzidzenu eye nàde wò nukpɔkpɔwo. Nufiafia 6 vevieto hia be nàyi edzi.
orientation.grades.add_subjects: Tsɔ nufiafia bubuwo kpe ɖe eŋu
orientation.grades.add_more: Tsɔ nufiafia bubuwo kpe ɖe eŋu
orientation.grades.tip: Nukpɔkpɔ geɖe siwo nàɖe la, míaƒe aɖaŋunyanyadodowo asɔ wu.
orientation.grades.subject_added: Wotsɔ nufiafia la kpe ɖe eŋu dzedzetɔe
orientation.grades.subject_invalid: Nufiafia ƒe ŋkɔ mele eme o
orientation.grades.add_subjects_prompt: Tsɔ wò nufiafiawo kpe ɖe eŋu be nàdze nukpɔkpɔdede gɔme
orientation.career.title: Dɔwɔna ƒe mɔfia
orientation.career.question: Susu aɖe le asiwò tso nu si nèdi be yeazu le etsɔme?
orientation.career.no_problem: Kuxi aɖeke mele eme o! Míaɖo susufe siwo sɔ kple wò sukudeɖeɖe ƒe ŋusẽkpɔɖeŋuwo be míakpe ɖe ŋuwò nàke ɖe mɔnukpɔkpɔ yeyewo ŋu.
orientation.header.title: Mɔfia na susufe ɖeka tiatia
results.title: Wò aɖaŋunyanyadodo tɔxɛwo
advice.section.title: Aɖaŋuɖoɖowo kple ɖeɖefia
advice.section.subtitle: Tsa le susufewo kple etsɔme ƒe dɔwɔnawo me
advice.how_to_choose_content: De dzesi wò lɔlɔ̃nuwo, dzro dɔwɔna ƒe asi eye nàbu wò ganyenye ŋuti.
advice.future_jobs_content: Nunya wɔwɔ ƒe susu, nuwɔwɔ si nɔa anyi, cyberdedinɔnɔ kple lãmesẽ digital.
advice.student_testimonials_content: Ke ɖe sukuviwo ƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔwo ŋu le kɔleɖo vovovowo me.
advice.get_specific_recommendations: Xɔ aɖaŋunyanyadodo tɔxɛwo si tso wò nukpɔkpɔwo kple dzimedidiwo dzi
share.share_on_social: Ma le habɔbɔ kadodo ƒe mɔ̃wo dzi
file_upload.title: Ɖo wò nukpɔkpɔgbalẽ
file_upload.drag_drop: He wò nukpɔkpɔgbalẽ va afi sia
file_upload.supported_formats: Nɔnɔme siwo woxɔna: PNG, JPG, PDF
file_upload.resolution: Ɖoɖo: fɔto alo scan si le ŋutɔ
toast.report_error: Vodada le PDF nyatakaka wɔwɔ me
